item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Sunday, August 14 · 11:00am - 5:00pm Fourth Floor 119 Braintree Street Brighton, MA 02134 Park in lot downstairs. The front door of the building should be open. Follow the hallway on the right to the stairway at the end, climb up to the 4th floor, take a right and you're there. If the door is not open call Bob D. at (508) 930-5530, or as a last resort buzz unit no. 15. We're going to make stencils and signs. If you can, please bring red and/or black spray paint, long pieces of cardboard, tarps, canvas, and any other materials you might think may appropriate. And don't wear anything you don't want to see get painted! We'll have plenty of water and likely go out for food and drink after we're done.
item.name: Boston Sign-Making Party
